subject: docs(all): add project-specific sections to CLAUDE.md, update session docs
body:
CLAUDE.md now includes project-specific context alongside the shared glow-props
rules: Project Status, Architecture (full file tree), Key State Structures
(SearchParams, RadiusSearchResult, StationWithPrices), and updated AI Notes
with project-relevant items replacing glow-props-specific ones (TutorialModal,
Vite references removed).

SESSION_NOTES and HISTORY updated to reflect all work done this session
including documentation creation.
